dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's your business overview for this month.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage your upcoming and past appointments.

schedule.title: Schedule a New Appointment
schedule.step1_desc: Select the client for this appointment.
schedule.step2_desc: Choose one or more services for this session.
schedule.step3_desc: Pick a date and time for the appointment.
schedule.summary_desc: Review the details before confirming the appointment.
schedule.success_toast_desc: Appointment for {{name}} on {{date}} has been booked.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: View and manage your client roster.

add.title: Add New Customer
add.description: Enter the details for your new client.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
add.success_toast_desc: The new customer has been added successfully.

reading.title: AI Reading
reading.description: Perform a new tarot reading for a client.
reading.selectClientPlaceholder: Choose a client for the reading
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... generating your reading.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The connection to the ethereal plane was lost. Please try again.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: An overview of the readings you offer.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: General pricing guide for tarot services in Indonesia.
pricing.table_description: Prices are estimates and may vary. All prices in Indonesian Rupiah (Rp).

factors.experience: Experience: More famous or experienced readers may have higher rates.
factors.media: Consultation Medium: In-person readings are usually more expensive.
factors.complexity: Number of Questions/Spreads: The more complex, the higher the price.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: View and manage your public-facing profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application and service settings.

specializations.title: Service Specializations
specializations.description: Manage the types of readings you offer.

durations.title: Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Set the available session lengths and their prices.

payment.title: Payment Gateways
payment.description: Connect and manage your payment options.
